GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of specified username

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of specified article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches an article with updated amount of votes

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/.description: serves an array of all articles
